Structs/StripesShape.html#/s:15Navigatio.name: insertion
Structs/StripesShape.html#/s:15Navigatio.abstract: When true the animation will enlarge the view, when false the animation will shrink the view.

Structs/StripesShape.html#/s:15Navigatio.name: horizontal
Structs/StripesShape.html#/s:15Navigatio.abstract: When true then the stripes will be layed horizontally, otherwise vertically.

Structs/StripesShape.html#/s:15Navigatio.name: inverted
Structs/StripesShape.html#/s:15Navigatio.abstract: When false then the horizontal animation is intended to the bottom, when true then to the top.

Structs/CircleShape.html.name: CircleShape
Structs/CircleShape.html.abstract: A circle shape which size can be animated.

Structs/RectangleShape.html.name: RectangleShape
Structs/RectangleShape.html.abstract: A rectangle shape which size can be animated.

Structs/StripesShape.html.name: StripesShape
Structs/StripesShape.html.abstract: A slicing pattern consisting of multiple rectangle shapes.

Structs/HueRotationModifier.html#/s:15Na.name: angle
Structs/HueRotationModifier.html#/s:15Na.abstract: The hue rotation angle to apply to the colors in this view.

Structs/ContrastModifier.html#/s:15Navig.name: contrast
Structs/ContrastModifier.html#/s:15Navig.abstract: The intensity of color contrast to apply.

Structs/ClipShapeModifier.html#/s:15Navi.name: shape
Structs/ClipShapeModifier.html#/s:15Navi.abstract: The clipping shape to use for this view. The shape fills the viewâ€™s frame, while maintaining its aspect ratio.

Structs/ClipShapeModifier.html#/s:15Navi.name: style
Structs/ClipShapeModifier.html#/s:15Navi.abstract: The fill style to use when rasterizing shape.

Structs/BlurModifier.html#/s:15Navigatio.name: opaque
Structs/BlurModifier.html#/s:15Navigatio.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the blur renderer permits transparency in the blur output.

Structs/BlurModifier.html.name: BlurModifier
Structs/BlurModifier.html.abstract: The modifier wrapper for the corresponding SwiftUI function.

Structs/BrightnessModifier.html.name: BrightnessModifier
Structs/BrightnessModifier.html.abstract: The modifier wrapper for the corresponding SwiftUI function.

Structs/ClipShapeModifier.html.name: ClipShapeModifier
Structs/ClipShapeModifier.html.abstract: The modifier wrapper for the corresponding SwiftUI function.

Structs/ContrastModifier.html.name: ContrastModifier
Structs/ContrastModifier.html.abstract: The modifier wrapper for the corresponding SwiftUI function.

Structs/HueRotationModifier.html.name: HueRotationModifier
Structs/HueRotationModifier.html.abstract: The modifier wrapper for the corresponding SwiftUI function.

Structs/SaturationModifier.html.name: SaturationModifier
Structs/SaturationModifier.html.abstract: The modifier wrapper for the corresponding SwiftUI function.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP15.name: onAnimationCompleted(for:completion:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP15.abstract: Calls the completion handler whenever an animation on the given value completes.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP15.name: onDidAppear(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP15.abstract: Calls the action when the given view has fully transitioned in.

View%20Lifecycle.html#/s:15NavigationSta.name: NavigationViewLifecycleAction
View%20Lifecycle.html#/s:15NavigationSta.abstract: The type of action performed on lifecycle events of views embedded in a NavigationView.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: blur(radius:)
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A transition which uses a blurring effect.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: brightness(_:)
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A transition which uses a brighness effect.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: circleShape
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A custom transition using a scaling circle.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: contrast(_:)
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A transition which changes the contrast of a view.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: hueRotation(_:)
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A transition which uses a brighness effect.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: rectangleShape
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A custom transition using a scaling rectangle.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: saturation(_:)
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A transition which uses a brighness effect.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: static
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A transition which doesn’t apply any visible changes, but is not the identity because using SwiftUI’s identity leads to results

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: stripes(stripes:horizontal:inverted:)
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A custom transition using horizontal or vertical stripes to blend over.

Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.name: tiltAndFly
Extensions/AnyTransition.html#/s:7SwiftU.abstract: A custom transition using a 3D geometry effect.

Structs/NavigationStackView.html#/s:15Na.name: init(_:defaultView:)
Structs/NavigationStackView.html#/s:15Na.abstract: Initializes the navigation stack view with a given ID and its default content.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: silenceErrors
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Flag used to determine if errors are thrown or silently ignored.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: showView(_:animation:alternativeView:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Performs the navigation by showing a new view.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: hideTopViewWithReverseAnimation()
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Navigates back to the previews view by using its reverse animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: hideTopView(animation:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Navigates back to the previous view by using a provided a specific transition animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: hideView(_:animation:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Navigates back to a specific navigation stack view somewhere in the stack.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: hideViewWithReverseAnimation(_:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Navigates back to a specific navigation stack view somewhere in the stack by using its reverse animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: hasAlternativeViewShowing
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Returns whether there is a navigation view on the stack or not, meaning is it possible to navigate back or not.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: isAlternativeViewShowing(_:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Returns whether there is a navigation view with a specific ID on the stack or not,

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: topViewShowingBinding()
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Creates and returns a binding for the top navigation stack view’s showing flag.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: viewShowingBinding(_:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: Creates and returns a binding for a navigation stack view’s showing flag.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: pushContent(_:alternativeView:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: A convenience method to navigate to a new view with a push transition animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: popContent(_:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: A convenience method to navigate back to a previous view with a pop transition animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: presentContent(_:alternativeView:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: A convenience method to navigate to a new view with a present transition animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: dismissContent(_:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: A convenience method to navigate back to a previous view with a dismiss transition animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: fadeInContent(_:alternativeView:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: A convenience method to navigate to a new view with a fade-in transition animation.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.name: fadeOutContent(_:)
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html#/s:15N.abstract: A convenience method to navigate back to a previous view with a fade-out transition animation.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.name: zIndexOfBehind
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.abstract: The Z-Index (-1) to use by content which should be shown behind the other.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.name: zIndexOfInFront
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.abstract: The Z-Index (1) to use by content which should be shown in front of the other.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.name: push
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.abstract: A transition animation suitable for a typical push animation.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.name: pop
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.abstract: A transition animation suitable for a typical pop animation.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.name: present
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.abstract: A transition animation suitable for a typical modal present animation.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.name: dismiss
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.abstract: A transition animation suitable for a typical modal dismiss animation.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.name: fade
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html#/s:15Na.abstract: A transition animation used to blend the new view into the old view.

Structs/NavigationAnimation.html.name: NavigationAnimation
Structs/NavigationAnimation.html.abstract: A data struct with information for a transition animation used by the NavigationStackView.

NavigationStack.html#/s:15NavigationStac.name: NavigationModel
NavigationStack.html#/s:15NavigationStac.abstract: A concrete type of navigation model which uses strings as identifier.

Classes/NavigationStackModel.html.name: NavigationStackModel
Classes/NavigationStackModel.html.abstract: The underlying NavigationStackView‘s model which can be manipulated to apply the navigation transitions.

Structs/NavigationStackView.html.name: NavigationStackView
Structs/NavigationStackView.html.abstract: The navigation view used to switch content when applying a navigation transition.
